name: Salesken
description: Salesken’s mission is to make every sale your best sale. We aim to augment human intelligence and bring science to sales. Salesken’s enterprise software leverages the power of cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology to supercharge performance for sales representatives, managers and teams. We work with organisations of all sizes across the globe. Our goal is to help every sales representative achieve their highest potential, help every sales manager foster peak performance and help every organisation maximise efficiency, transparency and revenue.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Real-time conversation intelligence for sales teams to sell better
ShortDescription: Salesken’s mission is to make every sale your best sale. We aim to augment human intelligence and bring science to sales.
enhanced_description: Salesken is an enterprise software that provides real-time conversation intelligence for sales teams, aiming to augment human intelligence and bring science to sales. Leveraging cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology, the platform offers features such as transcription and recording of sales conversations, call monitoring with summary and advisory capabilities, and revenue insights and predictability. Salesken is designed to supercharge performance for sales representatives, managers, and teams, helping organizations of all sizes maximize efficiency, transparency, and revenue, and enabling every sales professional to achieve their highest potential.
key_use_cases: Enabling sales managers to coach and monitor sales teams
competitive_advantages: Augments human intelligence to bring science to sales
Focuses on supercharging performance for sales representatives, managers, and teams
roi_benefits: Help sales representatives achieve highest potential
Help sales managers foster peak performance
